INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address
PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters long
REGISTRATION_SUCCESSFUL: Registration successful. Please check your email to confirm your account.
EMAIL_CONFIRMATION_REQUIRED: Email confirmation required. Please check your inbox for the confirmation email or request a new one.
ACCOUNT_DEACTIVATED: Your account has been deactivated. Please contact support.
CONFIRMATION_TOKEN_EXPIRED: Confirmation token has expired. Please request a new confirmation email.
EMAIL_ALREADY_CONFIRMED: Email already confirmed. You can now log in.
EMAIL_CONFIRMED_SUCCESSFULLY: Email confirmed successfully! Your account is now active. You can log in.
CONFIRMATION_EMAIL_SENT: If an account with that email exists, a confirmation email has been sent.
ACCOUNT_ALREADY_ACTIVE: Your email is already confirmed. You can log in.
NEW_CONFIRMATION_EMAIL_SENT: A new confirmation email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
ERROR_CREATING_USER: An error occurred while creating the user
ERROR_RETRIEVING_USERS: An error occurred while retrieving users
ERROR_CONFIRMING_EMAIL: An error occurred while confirming your email.
ERROR_RETRIEVING_STAFF_LIST: An error occurred while retrieving staff list
ERROR_RETRIEVING_STAFF_MEMBER: An error occurred while retrieving staff member
ERROR_CREATING_STAFF_MEMBER: An error occurred while creating staff member
ERROR_UPDATING_STAFF_MEMBER: An error occurred while updating staff member
ERROR_DELETING_STAFF_MEMBER: An error occurred while deleting staff member
ERROR_RESENDING_INVITATION: An error occurred while resending invitation
ERROR_VALIDATING_INVITATION: An error occurred while validating the invitation.
ERROR_SETTING_UP_ACCOUNT: An error occurred while setting up your account.
